about_the_game: Taphouse VR's beloved musical soundtrack was composed by Antti Luode from Antti's Instrumentals! Antti Luode's royalty-free music was used in Taphouse VR under the Creative Commons CC BY 3.0 license. This soundtrack is unchanged from the original music - we've just added the locations you heard them in. Bottoms up!
